markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tree Climber (Goblin)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1006) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Tailed Goblin](/Heritages.aspx?ID=37) heritage or [Treedweller Goblin](/Heritages.aspx?ID=38) heritage

</column>

---

Your time in forest or jungle canopies has taught you how to scramble across branches with sure feet. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet. If you also have the [Cave Climber](/Feats.aspx?ID=48) ancestry feat, your total climb Speed increases to your land Speed when climbing trees.
name: Tree Climber (Goblin)
prerequisite: Tailed Goblin heritage or Treedweller Goblin heritage

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Tree Climber (Goblin) Source Character Guide pg. 38 2.0 Prerequisites Tailed Goblin heritage or Treedweller Goblin heritage --- Your time in forest or jungle canopies has taught you how to scramble across branches with sure feet. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet. If you also have the Cave Climber ancestry feat, your total climb Speed increases to your land Speed when climbing trees.
